website_summaries.verdict: Absolutely packed with a wide variety of quality and delicious bits, rats will have a blast picking out healthy chunks of pineapple, peas, and pumpkin seeds from a daily serving of Fiesta.
pros: Corn, wheat, sunflower seeds, oats, and shelled peanuts are the first 5 ingredients
An impressive mix of tasty bits, including dried bananas, carrots, and raisins
cons: Spoiled rats may forage for their favorite bits and ignore the rest

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy for rats
customer_reviews.text: Contains raw peanuts which can cause blood clots and kill pet rats.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey P

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR RATS OR MICE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful pet food. Wish I read more reviews before purchasing because I was treated to a bad of dried corn and peanuts which are detrimental to a rats health. It is mind blowing that any company would market this as a “mouse and rat food”. I would rather give my rats pellets that they hate than food that kills them
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Bad diet
customer_reviews.text: this food has dry corn in it which is not healthy for Rats. I switched to Oxbow and not only do they LOVE it, it is also vet recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stu the Janitor

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Rats love it, Not sure if best option for them nutrition wise
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this & it's a great value for the price, but definitely not the right nutrition they need on a daily basis (from researching). I wish thecorn was taken out. Unfortunately my rats won't eat the complete nutrition food I got for them, as they only want this & fresh food now. :O This really should be an occasional treat as others mentioned (if u didn't go the route I did) as the rats do love to pick out their favorite items. One of my rats stuffs as much food as she can in her mouth & runs to hide it :).
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.  This food doesn't have wasted bits like alfalfa pellets cause mice won't eat them.
customer_reviews.text: When I accidentally started breeding mice ("I think that one looks pregnant..." famous last words) I was going to my local pet store and buying a bag smaller than this for $9.99. That was fine at first, now, with my stupidity at failing to properly separate male hoppers from female hoppers, I have over 200 mice. Amazon, once again, has saved me. This along with other types of food, keeps the whole 16 container-stinky lot of them well fed, which in turn, keeps my snakes well fed.
customer_reviews.author: Margana S

customer_reviews.title: Too much is not edible by pet rats
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my pet rats. They each much of it, but do not like the pellets which make up about 40% of the bulk of this product. Not sure if it's alfalfa or what but they just will not eat that part, and since that makes up 40% of the volume, essentially 40% of this is wasted and goes into the trash. Probably would be fine for rodents who like/can eat that kind of pellet, but not good for rats.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J. Ischo

customer_reviews.title: Mice love it, but it is costly.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, mice love the food, but it is definitely costly which is the only downside. However, if you have picky mice or rats, they will likely gobble this right up, so it is definitely a quality product. I just wish it was not so expensive. In addition, there is no option to buy very large bags and save money, so it gets to be quite an expense.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kleber

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This is great, but I have 4 rats and they reside in 2 different cages. All 4 of them pick around the “food” I clean their cages daily, change their water and typically have to either clean out all the smaller seeds, or change out the food dishes altogether, as they don’t like all the little seeds. So I’m really paying twice what I should be for what they actually eat.
customer_reviews.author: Big mama

customer_reviews.title: Unhealthy and not fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Got flies and other bugs quickly while being sealed! Not fresh! Not healthy! The corn can also be poisonous to rats! Do not buy! Oxbow food is a much better option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy for our ratties tummies!
customer_reviews.text: Our rats love this food mix! It has all sorts of lovely seeds and treats for them. They especially love the peanuts and dehydrated carrot pieces! We were worried that they might not like it when we changed them to this from their previous food but they run to the bowl when we refill it. Happy rats means happy people!
customer_reviews.author: Val Z.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Unless your rat will eat anything it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at least half of it was tiny seeds that the rat wasn’t interested in. I literally sifted out all the little seeds and it was just over half. She pick thru most of it with eating much. She likes the whole peanuts but there was literally 2 full size peanuts in shell. And 6 half ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jon T.

customer_reviews.title: Not the healthiest for rats, but not bad either
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the healthiest food to give your rat, but if you (a) mix it with healthier rat pellets and (b) add it as a supplement to fresh fruits and veggies and such, this will not do any damage and will serve as a nice daily treat for your buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Mays

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: My ratties loved it! Sadly they were picking through it and only eating what they wanted. So they were basically eating a quarter of what I would give them.. not worth the money. I’m sure the squirrels in my back yard were loving all the food I was giving them but I wasn’t buying this for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bloated with Birdseed- stick to the pellets.
customer_reviews.text: My rats love SOME of the contents of this food. They stuff it with far too much birdseed which it just to make the product heavier and it's not eaten. The "good " stuff is fewer and far between than it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Half of this mix is good, half gets thrown out
customer_reviews.text: My pet rats eat about half of the ingredients in this mix. They love cracking into the peanut shells and digging out the peanuts, but I had read that peanuts aren’t healthy for rats? There are also a lot of whole kernel corn, which I also read was bad for rats. Luckily they don’t eat the kernels. They do like fresh cooked corn though!! I just hate throwing away half of their food bowl every day!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly White

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value-- get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My rats LOVE this stuff. I had bought a bag of the stuff by the same brand in PetCo for around $10 and it's nowhere near the amount or the quality of this stuff. This is a great blend of whole peanuts, dried corn, sunflower seeds, and other dried goodies and small seeds. The rats love digging through and finding their favorite bits. I supplement giving my rats half of this mixture and half food pellets :) This will be the only brand I'll buy from now on. Thanks for providing an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: annabumgarner20

customer_reviews.title: Rat Food
customer_reviews.text: I could not give this 5 stars because the bag has some type of pellets that disintegrates & I have to throw at least a quarter or more of the bag away. I wish there were more peanuts in the bag (rats favorite)....Other than that, the rats love the food.
customer_reviews.author: LindaLewWho

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Rats like most of it
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 rats. They don’t like the little stick looking pieces that seem to be in all rat food mixes. Otherwise this mix is the best. They eat everything else. We use it as a treat, mixed in with their regular food
customer_reviews.author: TexasKel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not healthy
customer_reviews.text: Our rat loved this food but can unfortunately pick out her favorite parts and dump out the rest. This keeps her from getting a balanced diet like she would with pellets (what we switched to).
customer_reviews.author: Corrina Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not rat food
customer_reviews.text: Rats don't like this food. They pick out the bits they like eat that and waste the majority of it unless you starve them into eating this. The only stuff remotely healthy for them in it they avoid eating. This is really not a rat food unless your rats are feeders for snakes. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Eidolon

customer_reviews.title: Rat food.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has 2 rats and I like the convenience of ordering their supplies online. This is the best brand we've found for them. I trust the food is fresh and have had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica bosarge

customer_reviews.title: Happy rats!
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this. We got them as pups, and we bought this after they didn't enjoy the pellets we got with them. Now they are fat happy rats!!! (Not really fat, but they enjoy the food)
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Devours them
customer_reviews.text: My pet rat Milky goes crazy for these and absolutely will give up anything to have these and it's the only food or treat she'll take with her into her hammock. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: A mouse favorite!
customer_reviews.text: The mouse loves it and as mice do, hoards the rest for later. Great selection of mouse favorites at a good price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J Samuels

customer_reviews.title: good for mice
customer_reviews.text: my mice love this food the best! the pumpkin seeds are defiantly a favorite but overall the best choice in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Bag was torn open :(
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loves it. Only reason I'm giving it 3 starts was because the bag was torn when I opened the box and seeds got everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mahra Crone

customer_reviews.title: Not a good diet (messy)
customer_reviews.text: Heard good things about this rat food until I did actual research! Contains peanuts (BAD for rats) and my rats only liked the sunflower seeds, which are a mess and are still not great for them. I’d recommend Oxbow, healthy and won’t make a disaster in the cage after 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Jessica turner

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My little rats love this food.. they are very enthusiastic when I feed them, more so than with other brands...
customer_reviews.author: James Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Nice mix
customer_reviews.text: The rats seemed to like it, and with there being a large mix on ingredients for size and component. Have subscribed for monthly deliveries of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoned

customer_reviews.title: Raw peanuts?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing it had peanuts in it. Since it doesn't specify whether or not the peanuts are roasted I have to pull them all out because RAW PEANUTS ARE AWFUL FOR RATS! Other than that it looks fine for small rodents. I wouldn't recommend feeding this to a ferret or any other obligate carnivore though.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Rats favorite meal
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaper than the same product at the big box pet stores. Our rats are picky and love this food.
customer_reviews.author: M. Martz

customer_reviews.title: Rats like it
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 rats and they really like this food. I can't really vouch for the science of what they should be getting nutritionally, but the food looks varied and still has some nutri-block type base. Unfortunately they don't love the blocks, so that's usually what they leave in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: RachelMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Who knows
customer_reviews.text: Rat will eat half of what's there. Eats same stuff every time. Half goes to waste.
customer_reviews.author: P. M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rat loves this. Kind of difficult to "review" rat food lol. But he's definitely digging his new bites.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 dumbo rats. More affordable than most in store foods for rodents and this mix has a great variety of stuff they love. Will be my new go-to.
customer_reviews.author: C.E.V.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mice, Happy Me
customer_reviews.text: If my mice and rat like it, then I'm happy too. The five stars is from my mice and rat.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My rat loves the mixes of nuts and corn in this, Also gives him a well balanced diet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: My rats like this And it’s a good price- best I’ve found
customer_reviews.author: Julie Healey

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: The mice I had loved this food all except for the corn which they never seemed to eat
customer_reviews.author: Katie Asselin

customer_reviews.title: Food
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this food.. the bag is a great size.. I’ve had it for over a month and it’s half way gone. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit.
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this food. It does seem to encourage foraging type behaviors, though, so keep that in mind. One of our rats likes to throw his food around while he searches for the exact bit he wants to eat - something he didn't do before we switched brands - but I think that's more our rat than the food. Will definitely be getting it again for them!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: My Rats Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My three boys are a little picky with their food, but they have never turned their nose to this stuff! :) Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Rat Food
customer_reviews.text: I have raised rats on this food and they absolutely devour it. Kaytee does a great job of adding various seeds and nuts that the rats love!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: If you need rat food frequently this is a good buy. Fresh, variety, good for their health. Last for a little over a week, of course depending how many you're feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Good for hampster
customer_reviews.text: Got for dwarf hampster and he seems to really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cole

customer_reviews.title: LATE PACKAGE
customer_reviews.text: Good product but it was delivered past expected delivery date, and my rat had to eat table scraps (no car).
customer_reviews.author: Maci

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality food rats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality food good assortment our rats love this food and it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dclouds

customer_reviews.title: Our rats are healthy
customer_reviews.text: Our rats really like this food and seem very healthy. A good sized bag.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Giurlani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The rat was used to scraps apparently when I got her but she really seems to enjoy this food.
customer_reviews.author: wanda kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great rat food
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mix. Our rats Ratitouille and Brian enjoy this mix very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My rat loves this mix, especially the whole peanuts! He gets pretty excited about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: This is not safe for rats. Could give them food poisoning. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry DeFonte

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: We thought it was good, but it sadly is not.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carrithers

customer_reviews.title: which isn't good for male rats
customer_reviews.text: This rat food contained mostly seeds and grain, which my rats do not care for and a lot of corn, which isn't good for male rats. I found myself throwing most of it out. I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.A.

customer_reviews.title: Best rat food!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this food for years and it’s better than any other brand I’ve come across. The price is much better than pet stores as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 rats love the medley of seeds, nuts, and other little snacks in this 4.5 pound bag. Everytime I open the bag they are rushing out of their beds to come grab a peanut or sunflower seed. If they love it, I love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Rats aren't impressed
customer_reviews.text: my rats pull a couple items out of the dish and ignore probably 80% of what's in there.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sollenberger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My rat loves this food. Bag twice as big as the one I can get at my pet store for the same price if not a few dollars cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Britainey Streepy

customer_reviews.title: Kip is officially a spoiled happy rat. Thank you again
customer_reviews.text: I rescued my rat Kip from my sisters snake. I put kip on this brand on food when i got him. After proper care and treatment; he went from being small and thin to a total fatty. Kip is officially a spoiled happy rat. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: MEE

customer_reviews.title: great buy , they want 15$ at the local petco !!
customer_reviews.text: the rats love it . they dont eat every single thing but not 1 of them eats the same stuff anyway . overall they eat 90% or more
customer_reviews.author: Kingfish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little rattie in your life.
customer_reviews.text: Little Pepper loves this mix. Not as much as peanut M&Ms, but as a daily food, it's good. 8*)
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up from the mice..
customer_reviews.text: Squeek squeek squeek...squeek squeek : "We like this brand... Good food."
customer_reviews.author: Etc Etc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My mice like this food a lot. Good size and value.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Dangerous For Pet Rats
customer_reviews.text: Not ok for rats! This food has raw peanuts and dried corn in it which is extremely dangerous for pet rats. By the time I realized it, one of my pet rats was acting sick after just a few days of consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mouse report
customer_reviews.text: My mice told me that this food was filling and delicious! They kept asking for seconds. This is some good nutritious mouse food.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Kaytee Fiesta for Mouse and Pet Rats,...
customer_reviews.text: I was buying this for some time for my grandson's pet rats and they sure seemed to love it. He had 4 rats and this is the food they were raised on.
customer_reviews.author: NannyJ

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: Lots of small seeds that my rats wouldn’t eat. Would probably be better for a mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Alexus Gauselman

customer_reviews.title: Great variety.
customer_reviews.text: My rats love the assortment they eat everything but the green pellets
customer_reviews.author: Kaisha joice

customer_reviews.title: Maybe our rats are just picky eaters but they wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe our rats are just picky eaters but they wouldn't touch it. Just covered it with their bedding every time we filled their bowl with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tru

customer_reviews.title: Rats won't even eat it
customer_reviews.text: My rats won't eat it at all! Wish I wouldn't have wasted my money. It has dry corn and whole peanuts as well, which aren't even good for rats to have. Making my own rat food!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Happy pets
customer_reviews.text: My ratties love this, so much more than any I can find in the store!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: I feed this as a treat to my pet rats not as their staple diet. They love it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Devinney

customer_reviews.title: Rats love it
customer_reviews.text: The rats absolutely live this product and I will for now on order online
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nutricious & Delicious for your Rats
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 rats, 2 adult males and 2 adult females, and this has been their favorite food thus far. Seems to have all the nutrients that adult rats need and a good amount of variety.
customer_reviews.author: H. MilesTop Contributor: Travel

customer_reviews.title: they seem to love it as it has quite a variety in it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my baby rats, they seem to love it as it has quite a variety in it for them, plus smaller sixe pieces just right for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy  51

customer_reviews.title: My rats favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This food is varied enough to keep your pet rodent interested in eating it. Never had any problems with it and it's not mainly corn which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my rats really love the mr. brown's tropical mix but this was a great substitute
customer_reviews.author: 🌷 markelle 🐝🌷

customer_reviews.title: Rats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My “boys” love this brand of food. It’s like first dibs on who get the peanuts first.
customer_reviews.author: Waldos_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good shit.
customer_reviews.text: My sons mouse loves it of course, that was expected. I was a little irritated that the bag had a hole in it, which is the fault of the supplier not amazon. Other than the hole it's wonderful lmao
customer_reviews.author: The Ehn’s stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety, but it has quite a bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Variety, but it has quite a bit of corn which is linked to increased risk of cancer in rats, so I have to pick it out before feeding it to them
customer_reviews.author: Jdogg

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the amount that you get
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the amount that you get! At the pet store, a bag half the size of this is the same price at this one. So glad I found this listing.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Woerlee

customer_reviews.title: My ratties love this food! Recommend to other rat owners.
customer_reviews.text: My ratties love this food! My hairless always jumps when I give her a peanut from this feed! It's her favorite part of the mix. Recommend to other rat owners.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: They love this food...
customer_reviews.text: They love this food...yes they pick out their favorites....but it is 100% CONSUMED. NO WASTE HERE! For 2 big boys it last almost a month.
customer_reviews.author: david gardner

customer_reviews.title: packaging problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Sometimes the packaging may get a slice or a small home in some way. This didn't happen all the time but 1-2 times out of 7( or 8) times I purchased this product this I would have occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My one year old pet rat from Petco loves this fiesta mix. It makes a good every-day food for her, providing many varieties in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: My rats loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice mixture of various food that my rats really enjoyed, especially the peanuts! Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Natali Nemirovsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of my favorites for my rats because there's so much variety to it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: ... sunflower seeds so I'd say it's a plus and awesome food
customer_reviews.text: I got the food and there is a hole in the bottom of the bag but my mouse loves the sunflower seeds so I'd say it's a plus and awesome food
customer_reviews.author: Molly Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our rats really like this food! :) It adds some variety to their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Eron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great food has soft and hard food so the rat can strengthen his teeth
customer_reviews.author: Etienne baber

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great mouse food with a variety of different items to satisfy every nutritional need.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Just reordered this food for the fifth time! It's half the price at the pet stores and our rats love it!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Good, my rats eat most of it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 rats love this mix, except for a few things they don't eat.
customer_reviews.author: H and the J's

customer_reviews.title: My rat loves this food.
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best food that I have found for my rat, she loves and eats everything contained within. Some food animals can tend to pick out pieces that they don't like and they just get wasted, but I haven't run into that problem with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Aislinn Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect food for mice and rats
customer_reviews.text: A friend rescues mice and rats from test facilities and I bought this product to help. She highly recommends this!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Beach

customer_reviews.title: It's a Fiesta!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this food for my rats because it was recommended to me by a friend. The rats like it because it is a mixture of all types of things. It reminds me of bird food. It has everything from regular rat food to whole peanuts to sunflower seeds. It even has chunks of food which they love! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Franzel

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: My rats live off of this. I got them a couple different foods in their life, but, they do a pretty good job with this. They aren't crazy about the pellets, but, I doubt you'll find a rat that eats everything. I think it has a good blend. I also have very spoiled rats who get fresh food and playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve

customer_reviews.title: my rats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 rats and have been feeding them this food since I got them. They won't bother to eat anything else only this! They never eat the pellets though but everything else they will. I usually buy this stuff from petco but they sell it for $20. So I'm definitely going to start buying from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Anastaisia Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the first 7/8's of the bag, then all the big pieces are gone and you're left with just the small stuff, so I just mix it in with a new bag for my rats. Not exactly great for their diet, but good if you're supplementing their meals with fresh fruits and veggies, which I'm not.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C

customer_reviews.title: This is their favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Danny and Oreo love this food. They don't eat the tiny seeds but eat everything else. They don't knock the dish over to look for something good.. ha ha ha.. it's all good. They come running when I feed them :) They're happy and that makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

product_meta.title: Kaytee Fiesta Mouse And Rat Food, 4.5-Lb Bag
product_meta.description: Kaytee Fiesta Mouse and Rat food is a nutritionally fortified gourmet diet made of a premium blend of fruits, vegetables, seeds and grains offering maximum variety, fun and nutrition for small animals. Fiesta contains prebiotics and probiotics to support digestive health and is formulated with your small animal species in mind. Kaytee understands that sharing your life with a pet bird is not only enjoyable but very enriching. Kaytee shows our love by ensuring we provide your pet with the best nutrition for a long and healthy life. With over 150 years of nutritional experience, it's no wonder why Kaytee is at the heart of every healthy feeding routine.
feature_bullets: Shapes And Textures Support Dental Health Through Natural Chewing Activity
Prebiotics And Probiotics To Support Digestive Health
Assorted Fruits And Veggies For Added Enrichment And Variety
Rich In Natural Antioxidantsfor General Health & Immune Support

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
